tool.name: Sample Level Metrics RNA
tool.description: Metrics calculated at the sample RNA metrics, for use in CGD and for additional QC.

param.name: hk_file
param.label: Housekeeping Gene List
param.help: List of housekeeping genes to output metrics for.

tool.help:
usage: sample_metrics_rna.py [-h] [--version] counts hk_file outjson out
positional arguments: counts Kallisto counts matrix. hk_file List of housekeeping genes to output outjson json output for CGD out Output file in human readable text format.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --version show program's version number and exit
